sentences.en: Again, a little bit of naivete there.
sentences.cn: 他在这里再一次有点“天真烂漫”.

sentences.en: And to think that all of it had happened so innocently, with naivete on her part.
sentences.cn: 她也想到,对她来说这一切发生的多么纯洁, 多么天真.

sentences.en: He combined curious qualities of naivete with incisive wit and worldly sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他把天真质朴的奇怪品质同锐利的机智和老练的世故结合了起来.

sentences.en: He finds the naivete of the young officer very engaging.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这位青年军官那种天真烂漫的忠心耿耿非常可爱.

sentences.en: I like the naivete of children and living simply.
sentences.cn: 喜欢小孩子的纯真和平淡从容的生活.

sentences.en: I saw your smiling mask, pretending naivete, no matter what is goody - goody.
sentences.cn: 我再次看见你的微笑, 这纯真化作了伪善的面具.

sentences.en: Naive, perhaps, but whom did her naivete harm?
sentences.cn: 这大概有点幼稚, 可这幼稚又能伤着谁 呢 ?

sentences.en: She laughs at her own naivete.

words.tran_cn: 天真；质朴；纯真无邪；天真烂漫
